Function reference

Package overview

piar-package piar
Price Index Aggregation

Aggregation structure

Functions to make and work with price-index aggregation structures

aggregation_structure() weights(<pias>) update(<pias>) as.matrix(<pias>) as.data.frame(<pias>) expand_classification()
Aggregation structure

Price indexes

Functions to make and work with elemental and aggregated price indexes

Price indexes

Utilities

Helpful functions for working with prices and price indexes

Chain and rebase a price index
contrib()
Extract quote contributions
carry_forward() shadow_price()
Impute prices

Price relative
